body.p: In accordance with IAS 38, the intangible asset is amortised over the period in which it is expected to be available for use by the operator, ie years 3–10. The depreciable amount of the intangible asset (CU1,084) is allocated using a straight‑line method. The annual amortisation charge is therefore CU1,084 divided by 8 years, ie CU135 per year.
